metadata.name: Vision
metadata.description:
The lyrics for this song flowed from me in February 2020, just before the world went into lockdown. I was reflecting on my life's journey and how I would describe it to someone else. 

I've immersed myself in visualization as long as I can remember. On road trips as a kid, I would gaze out the window and let my imagination run wild. 

As a grown up, I noticed that my visualizations were my reality, so I became very intentional with how I used this skill to harness my power from within.

This is my Genesis NFT and it represents a reflection of my manifestation process. I'm sharing it with hope to inspire the one who receives it, to believe that they can use their vision as a source of power.

We are what we see.
